column3: 2 Thaw-Thaw the frozen corn by putting it in a sieve and running it under cold water
3 Add-Add the corn into a microwave-safe bowl
5 Add-1 teaspoon of pepper powder to the bowl
8 Microwave-Microwave the corn for 3 more minutes
10 Add-Add 1 teaspoon salt to the bowl
11 add-add lime juice to the bowl
12 Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl well
